front.title: Interface Stack Table Definition for Point to Point (P2P) Interface over LAN

abstract.t: In [RFC5309] defines the Point to Point (P2P) circuit type is one of the mainly used circuit types in link state routing protocol, and highlights it is important to identify the correct circuit type when forming adjacencies, flooding link state database packets, and monitor the link state. This document adds Point to Point (P2P) Interface over LAN type (ifType) management stack tables mapping to provide benefit for operational control, maintenance and statistics.
